title: Conversation Starter
description: Pick a question that fits the moment and kick off a great conversation. Random prompts are grouped by category.
helper: Copy and share any question you like.

all.title: All random
all.description: Mix every category and draw a random question.

ice.title: Icebreaker
ice.description: Light prompts to warm up the room.

friends.title: Friends / Group
friends.description: Great for casual hangouts and group chats.

family.title: Partner / Family
family.description: Questions that help you share feelings together.

self.title: Self reflection
self.description: Quiet prompts to check in with yourself.

ice.1: What hobby are you into lately?
ice.2: Which song have you been playing on repeat?
ice.3: Is there something you always do in the morning?
ice.4: What small goal do you want to achieve this year?
ice.5: What does a perfect rest day look like to you?

friends.1: What activity should we all try together next?
friends.2: If we had roles in a group, which one would you pick?
friends.3: Share the funniest thing that happened to you recently.
friends.4: If we’re picking snacks today, what should we get?

family.1: Can we each share a moment we felt grateful for?
family.2: What’s your most memorable travel scene?
family.3: Is there a small kindness you want from each other lately?
family.4: If we made a tradition, what would it be?
family.5: What’s the one thing you want to hear when you’re tired?

self.1: What experience helped you grow recently?
self.2: Which value do you want to focus on right now?
self.3: What was the best choice you made today?
self.4: How do you calm yourself when things feel messy?
self.5: What would you like to tell your future self?

openGraph.title: Conversation Starter
openGraph.description: A free conversation starter that recommends random questions whenever a chat feels stuck. Choose from icebreakers, friends/group, partner/family, or self reflection, then copy and share your favorite prompt instantly.
